members.name: GainNode()
members.description: Creates a new instance of an GainNode object. You shouldn't manually create a gain node; instead, use the method AudioContext.createGain().

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Options are as follows: gain: The amount of gain to apply. This parameter is a-rate and it's nominal range is (-∞,+∞). The default is 1.

members.name: GainNode.gain
members.description: Is an a-rate AudioParam representing the amount of gain to apply.
